Optional contact group where contacts will be assigned

member.summary: For returns UIMessage otherwise exception message.

member.name: M:CMS.ContactManagement.Web.UI.ContactImportController.GetUniqueImportData(System.Collections.Generic.List{CMS.ContactManagement.Web.UI.ContactImportData},CMS.ContactManagement.Web.UI.ResultModel)
member.summary: Filter out duplicates, the last one is one that's needed, because of consistency when duplicates are in more than one batch. Also updates duplicities.

member.name: M:CMS.ContactManagement.Web.UI.ContactImportController.CreateManualContactGroupMembers(CMS.ContactManagement.ContactGroupInfo,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{CMS.ContactManagement.ContactInfo})
member.summary: Adds contacts represented by to the contact group specified by . Only those contacts which are not part of contact group should be passed in . If some contact who is already a member of the group will be added, the whole operation will be unsuccessful. Contacts will be added as manual, not automatic and not from account.
member.param: Contact group where contacts will be assigned
Contacts which will be added

member.name: T:CMS.ContactManagement.Web.UI.ContactImportExceptionHandlingAttribute
member.summary: Any exception thrown by ContactImport should be passed to client translated and with correct HTTP status code. This class ensure such a behavior.

member.summary: Refers to data which were not imported. Result is same as and contains explanation message for each failed row.

member.summary: Names of the contact fields which shall be imported. This list specifies meaning of fields values in property.
member.example: If FieldsOrder[0] is "ContactEmail", than first item in each row in property represents contact email.

member.param: Represents contact change repository

member.name: M:CMS.ContactManagement.Web.UI.ContactImporter.ImportContacts(System.Collections.Generic.IList{CMS.ContactManagement.Web.UI.ContactImportData})
member.summary: Imports contacts into database. Large number of contacts can be imported, because bulk insert is used. Finds existing contacts by ContactEmail and updates them. This method does not check permissions. Contact groups and scoring are recalculated only for updated contacts. Contacts cannot be imported as global.
member.example:
Input: 1@email.cz 2@email.cz 2@email.cz 2@email.cz 3@email.cz
Already in DB: 3@email.cz
That's the result, when everything succeeds: 2 imported (1@email.cz and 2@email.cz) 3 duplicities (twice 2@email.cz and 3@email.cz)
member.param: Contacts to be imported

member.name: M:CMS.ContactManagement.Web.UI.ContactImporter.InsertContactsToDatabase(System.Data.DataTable)
member.summary: Inserts given dataTable containing contact data to database.

member.param: Those contacts will be updated
New field values
Results of this operation will be stored in this instance

member.name: M:CMS.ContactManagement.Web.UI.ContactImportFieldsProvider.GetCategoriesAndFieldsAvailableForImport
member.summary: Gets fields and categories from "om.contact.CMSImportContacts" alternative form without fields that are not supported by contact import (eg. DateTime). Supported data types are text, longtext, integer, longinteger. Categories without visible fields are not returned. Hidden categories with visible fields are not returned.
member.returns: Categories and fields that are available for contact import.
member.remarks: For instances running on lower than it return "om.contact.CMSImportContactsSimple" alternative form

member.name: M:CMS.ContactManagement.Web.UI.ContactImportFieldsProvider.IsFieldAvailableForImport(CMS.FormEngine.FormFieldInfo)
member.summary: Decides whether given should be available for import.
